original_text: God has done all this to help you. So now that you believe in Christ, you must grow as believers. Try very much to do always what is good. Then you should grow to know God more and more.
korean_text: 그러므로 너희가 더욱 힘써 너희 믿음에 덕을, 덕에 지식을,

sentences.original_text: God has done all this to help you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신을 돕기 위해 이 모든 것을 하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: So now that you believe in Christ,
Try very much to do always what is good.
sentences.korean_translation: 항상 선한 것을 행하도록 매우 노력하십시오.

sentences.original_text: Then you should grow to know God more and more.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 하나님을 더욱 더 알아가도록 성장해야 합니다.
